title: U of T Students Revolutionize Learning with AI Chatbot AceIt
description: Imagine having a study companion who creates personalized review materials for your exams. This is the essence of AceIt’s AI chatbot, Quizzy, an innovative service designed to enhance learning experiences for K-12 students. title: Bitcoin Is An Offset Strategy For The 21st Century: Maj. Lowrey
description:
Maj. Jason Lowrey, a US Space Force Astronautical Engineer, sent a letter about Bitcoin to the US Department of Defense on December 2. In the letter, Lowrey contended that reusable proof-of-work networks like Bitcoin represent an offset strategy for the 21st century. Based on his studies at the Department of Air Force’s Air Command and […]
